mapper.select: select * from( SELECT UserID, ADATE, userin, userout, ATEXCEPTION, CASE WHEN (USERIN is null or USEROUT is null) THEN '결석' WHEN USERIN>0910 AND USEROUT<1820 THEN '결석' WHEN USERIN>0910 THEN '지각' WHEN USEROUT<1820 THEN '조퇴' else '출석' end AS STATUE FROM BEPRESENT )where userid=#{userid}
